pullRequest.title: Task/argis refactor stdr
pullRequest.bodyText:
Comes from  #1860
This PR will be used to align original branch to current master
New Arcgis sink to avoid licence problems with SDK file.
[cygnus-ngsi][feature][NGSIArcgisSink] create NGSIArcgisSink #1672
[cygnus-ngsi][NameMapping] Allow deep Json attribute mapping. #1856

commit.message: Merge branch 'task/argis_reactor_stdr' of github.com:telefonicaid/fiware-cygnus into task/argis_reactor_stdr
Primera versión del Sink sin pasar test aún
Fix problema de limpieza de url
Tratamiento de timeouts a nivel de batch
Comprobación de timeouts en  método process
Comprueba si las features existen antes de añadirlas
Merge branch 'ArcgisRest' of https://github.com/Stdri/fiware-cygnus into ArcgisRest
Merge branch 'ArcgisRest' of https://github.com/Stdri/fiware-cygnus into ArcgisRest
Merge branch 'ArcgisRest' of https://github.com/Stdri/fiware-cygnus into ArcgisRest
Formatea valores Booleanos (String, integer.. etc) a su valor entero correspondiente

Merge pull request #3 from telefonicaid/master

Update from Telefonica's Master Branch
Merge branch 'JsonPath' of https://github.com/Stdri/fiware-cygnus into JsonPath

Merge pull request #1860 from Stdri/JsonPath

[cygnus-ngsi][feature][NGSIArcgisFeatureTableSink] new Arcgis sink (refactor + nm stop_on_first_attr_match + jsonPath ...)
fix merge: add missed argcis repos
revert contribution Allow deep Json attribute mapping

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            [cygnus-ngsi][ArcgisFeatureTableSink]New sink to persist Arcgis data. (#1672)
          
          
            
            [cygnus-arcgis][new backend]New Rest based backend to persist Arcgis data. (#1672)
          
          
            
            [cygnus-ngsi][ArcGis] New sink (rework) to persist Arcgis data (#1672)
          
          
            
            [cygnus-common][ArcGis] New Rest based backend to persist Arcgis data (#1672)
          
      
    
    
  

Not sure, but I think is closer to the "changelog style", as seen in https://github.com/telefonicaid/fiware-cygnus/releases?after=FIWARE_7.8.2
Not sure about cygnus-commons, but I'd say that backends are included in tha part, isn't it?

commit.message:
Update CHANGES_NEXT_RELEASE

Co-authored-by: Fermín Galán Márquez <fgalan@users.noreply.github.com>

nodes.bodyText: Weird indent in the added XML fragments...

This file has been renamed. Review references to it in other parts of the documenation (with grep it should be easy), so links can be fixed.
At least I think that .mkdocs.yml should be adjusted.

Mabye even better:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            [cygnus-ngsi][ArcGis] New sink (rework) to persist Arcgis data (#1672)
          
          
            
            [cygnus-ngsi][NGSIArcgisFeatureTableSink] New sink to persist Arcgis data, removing the old ArgGis sink (#1672)

nodes.bodyText:
I don't quite understand why this lines were removed. I thing the code will not compile without this lines.
They should be aggregated.

commit.message: FIX .gitignore to remove too broad filter

nodes.bodyText: Really needed? Which new code is using it?

Suggested change

                 * @param timeoutSecs
          
      
    
    
  

Weird... maybe there are another cases of "not fully replaced JavaDoc templates" like this?

+    private Date lastPersist = new Date();
+

+     * @param password

+     * @param b
